skills.name: Mega Smash
skills.description: Attacks with magical powers and inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns with a 50% chance. The damage increases according to Attack Speed.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Super Crush
skills.description: Attacks all enemies and stuns them with a 30% chance. The damage is proportionate to my MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:

Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: AOE

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 1.2*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.16*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Mach Crush
skills.description: Emits magical energy to attack all enemies. The damage increases by 30% for each harmful effect on the enemies.

skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target
